lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur have improved on last season's Premier League title push but the searing pace being set at the top by Chelsea means defeat in Wednesday's home clash with their London rivals could consign them to also-rans with half the season remaining.

headline.main: Improved Tottenham Face Massive Game at Home to Chelsea
